data.title: Bank of America Tower
data.meta_description: Bank of America Tower | Downtown Fort Worth
data.text:
Address

301 Commerce Street

Fort Worth, TX 76102

817-255-5700

visit website

View on Google Maps

Details

Located at 301 Commerce Street, this 38-story glass tower boasts stunning views of downtown. The city's second-tallest building was built in 1984 by Linbeck Construction Company and designed by Paul Rudolph, a renowned New York architect. This building offers 60,000 to 80,000 square feet of newly available, newly updated space, creating a prime opportunity for a multi-floor tenant.
